errors.error_description: The conda installation command `conda install -c=conda-forge ...` uses an incorrect syntax for specifying the channel.
The code formatting instructions incorrectly advise running the format script `./format_code.sh` before installing the necessary tools (`black`, `isort`).
correction_candidates: Combine the commands into a single line: `pip install black isort && ./format_code.sh`.
Swap the order of the two commands, so `pip install black isort` is executed first.
Remove the `./format_code.sh` script and instruct users to run `black .` and `isort .` directly.
errors.golden_answer: Swap the order of the two commands, so `pip install black isort` is executed first.
